A collection of personal, academic, and: A collection of personal, academic, and client projects I've worked on
fusionclinic_description: As the sole developer of Fusion Clinic — a medical room rental marketplace — I managed the migration from a third-party system to an in-house solution. Leveraged Next.js, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS for front-end development, and Laravel for back-end maintenance, implementing key features like PIX payment integration (via external gateway). The platform served 700 users, delivering significant gains in performance, security, and customer experience.
yoobe_description: As a developer at Yoobe.co — a logistics platform connecting employees of major companies to corporate swag for performance rewards or celebrations — I contributed to the development and maintenance of the redemption e-commerce platform, supporting up to 10k simultaneous users. Leveraged Next.js, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS for performance optimization and UI enhancements, alongside tools like Docker, Git, and GCP for scalability. On the back-end, performed maintenance on the Ruby on Rails and Spree framework, ensuring seamless integration with the front-end. The platform served key clients like Pipefy, RD Station, and Yampi, maintaining stability during high-demand peaks.
meetlink_description: Developed for Natalshopping, Meetlink integrates a web admin panel with touchscreen kiosks, allowing customers to request immediate assistance with a single touch. The system uses advanced communication technologies like WebRTC to connect users to support teams via real-time video, with support for Portuguese and Brazilian Sign Language (Libras).
natalshopping_description: Located in the capital city of Rio Grande do Norte, Natalshopping stands as the second largest mall in Natal/RN, setting the standard for innovation and quality in Northeastern Brazil. With modern architecture and cutting-edge infrastructure, it features 200+ stores, a diverse food court, multiplex cinema, and integrated leisure areas. Renowned for its complete customer experience, it combines premium brands, personalized services, and cultural events that celebrate local identity. An icon of conscious consumption and a strategic meeting point for those seeking convenience, entertainment, and sophistication in one destination.
cisreg_unp_description: Academic project developed for the Software Engineering course at UNP, in collaboration with the entire class. The system serves as a digital scheduler for the university's Integrated Health Center (CIS), allowing administrators to allocate time slots for partner municipalities (e.g., São Gonçalo do Amarante). Each city purchases hourly credits (e.g., 20h/month) converted into bookable slots by their representatives through the platform. The solution optimizes access to free healthcare for the population, ensuring financial control (contracted vs used hours) and preventing scheduling overlaps. Developed using agile methodologies, it features granular authentication, integrated calendar, and utilization reports.
efset_certificate_description: Validates advanced English proficiency for academic and professional contexts. Certifies ability to understand complex texts, communicate fluently, and engage in technical discussions. Internationally recognized standardized assessment.
